Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Description: This shabti wears a tripartite wig with parallel vertical striations, a broad collar, and bracelets on the wrists. It carries two hoes, and on its back is a basket. It is made of faded turquoise-blue faience; various details, such as the text, are painted in black. This shabti is inscribed with the name of the wab-priest Kyty.
